text.0: to the strong rudra bring we these our songs of praise to him the lord of heroes with the braided hair.
text.1: that it be well with all our cattle and our men that in this village all be healthy and wellfed.
text.2: be gracious unto us o rudra bring us joy thee lord of heroes thee with reverence will we serve.
text.3: whatever health and strength our father manu won by sacrifice may we under thy guidance gain.
text.4: by worship of the gods may we o bounteous one o rudra gain thy grace ruler of valiant men.
text.5: come to our families bringing them bliss may we whose heroes are uninjured bring thee sacred gifts.
text.6: hither we call for aid the wise the wanderer impetuous rudra perfecter of sacrifice.
text.7: may he repel from us the anger of the gods verily we desire his favourable grace.
text.8: him with the braided hair we call with reverence down the wildboar of the sky the red the dazzling shape.
text.9: may he his hand filled full of sovran medicines grant us protection shelter and a home secure.
text.10: to him the maruts father is this hymn addressed to strengthen rudras might a song more sweet than sweet.
text.11: grant us immortal one the food which mortals eat be gracious unto me my seed my progeny.
text.12: o rudra harm not either great or small of us harm not the growing boy harm not the fullgrown man.
text.13: slay not a sire among us slay no mother here and to our own dear bodies rudra do not harm.
text.14: harm us not rudra in our seed and progeny harm us not in the living nor in cows or steeds.
text.15: slay not our heroes in the fury of thy wrath bringing oblations evermore we call to thee.
text.16: even as a herdsman i have brought thee hymns of praise o father of the maruts give us happiness.
text.17: blessed is thy most favouring benevolence so verily do we desire thy saving help.
text.18: far be thy dart that killeth men or cattle thy bliss be with us o thou lord of heroes.
text.19: be gracious unto us o god and bless us and then vouchsafe us doublystrong protection.
text.20: we seeking help have spoken and adored him may rudra girt by maruts hear our calling.
text.21: this prayer of ours may varuṇa grant and mitra and aditi and sindhu earth and heaven.
